name: The Mainframe
description:
Welcome to the Fortune Dynamics Corporation facility!

You play as a cute little robot with one goal: To sacrifice its only power source for The Mainframe™.

This game was made from scratch in a week for the Kindred Community Game Jam.
Theme: Death is a new beginning.

(I ran out of time towards the end, so there are not that many levels. I might revisit the game in the future and add more though!)

Music:

Screen Saver by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5715-screen-saver
